data: We're excited that you're interested in contributing to BrowserAI! Whether it's fixing bugs, improving documentation, or suggesting new features, all contributions are welcome.
data.quick-start#Quick Start:
Fork the repository
Create your branch:
git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature
Commit changes:
git commit -m 'Add amazing feature'
Push to branch:
git push origin feature/amazing-feature
Open a Pull Request
data.-report-bugs#ğŸ› Report Bugs:
Use the issue tracker
Include browser & system info
Describe what happened
Share steps to reproduce
data.-improve-docs#ğŸ“ Improve Docs:

Translate content

Add new features

Write tests
data.code-style#Code Style:
Use TypeScript
Follow existing patterns
Add comments where needed
Include type definitions
data.requirements#Requirements:
Add tests for new features
Ensure existing tests pass
Test in supported browsers
data.pull-request-checklist#Pull Request Chec:
Code follows style guidelines
Tests added/updated
Documentation updated
Changelog updated
All tests passing

data: Have an idea to make BrowserAI better? We'd love to hear it! ğŸš€
data.how-to-submit#How to Submit:
Visit our GitHub Issues
Click "New Issue"
Select "Feature Request"
Fill in the template
data.-checklist#âœ… Checklist:
Check if the feature has already been requested
If it exists, add a ğŸ‘ reaction to show your support
Consider browser compatibility and performance
data.-template-guide#ğŸ“ Template Guide:
### Feature Description
[Clear, concise description of the feature]
### Use Case
[Why is this feature needed?]
### Proposed Solution
[How do you envision this working?]
### Alternatives Considered
[What alternatives have you thought about?]
### Additional Context
[Any other relevant information]
data.review-process#Review Process:
Our team will review your request
We may ask for more details
You'll be notified of updates
If approved, it'll be added to our roadmap
data.status-indicators#Status Indicators:
Status	Meaning	ğŸŸ¡ Pending Review	Request is being evaluated	ğŸŸ¢ Approved	Feature will be implemented	ğŸ”µ In Progress	Currently being developed	âš« Completed	Feature has been released	
Pro Tip: The more detailed and well-thought-out your request is, the easier it is for us to evaluate and implement it!
data.track-your-request#Track Your Request:
Watch the GitHub issue for updates
Join our Discord community for discussions

data: BrowserAI brings the power of AI directly to your web browser. Whether you're building a chatbot, adding voice capabilities, or creating interactive AI experiences, BrowserAI makes it simple to run advanced AI models directly in the browser - no server required!
data.what-is-browserai#What is BrowserAI?: BrowserAI is a JavaScript library that lets you harness the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) right in your web applications. From text generation to speech recognition and text-to-speech, everything runs locally in the browser, giving you complete control over your AI features.
data.-privacy-first#ğŸ”’ Privacy First: All processing happens right in the user's browser - no data ever leaves their device.
data.-cost-effective#ğŸ’° Cost-Effective: No expensive API calls or cloud computing costs - everything runs locally on the user's device.
data.-lightning-fast#ğŸš€ Lightning Fast: Powered by WebGPU acceleration for optimal performance, making AI interactions smooth and responsive.
data.-works-offline#ğŸŒ Works Offline: Download once, use anywhere! After the initial model download, everything works offline.
data.-flexible-engine-support#ğŸ”„ Flexible E: Choose between MLC and Transformers.js engines to best suit your needs.
data.-ready-to-use#ğŸ“¦ Ready to Use: Pre-configured with popular models - just load and start building!
data.-developer-friendly#ğŸ¯ Developer Friend: Simple, intuitive API that gets you up and running in minutes.
data.getting-started#Getting Started:
Ready to get started? Choose from the following options:
Installation - Install BrowserAI in your own environment
Basics - Learn the basic usage of BrowserAI
Demo - Check out our demos to see BrowserAI in action
